# Lembaran
> Brankas Aksara Personal yang Berdikari.

## Core Workspaces
- [packages/core]: Shared logic, encryption, and storage adapters.
- [packages/cli]: Interactive terminal interface (TUI) and command-line tools.
- [packages/web]: Next.js application (Landing page and GUI).

## Key Files
- [packages/core/src/Arsip.ts]: High-level encryption and storage manager.
- [packages/core/src/Brankas.ts]: Cryptographic engine (AES-GCM & Argon2id).
- [packages/core/src/Gudang.ts]: Storage abstraction layer (Adapter Pattern).
- [packages/cli/src/main.ts]: CLI entry point.
- [packages/web/app/page.tsx]: Main marketing landing page.
- [packages/web/app/arsip/page.tsx]: Main GUI application dashboard.

## Documentation & Context
- [docs/CLI_API.md]: CLI Command Reference.
- [docs/walkthrough.md]: Current architecture & features overview.
- [CHANGELOG.md]: History of changes.
- [CONTRIBUTING.md]: Guide for contributors.
- [LICENSE]: MIT License.
- [TERMS.md]: Terms of Service.
- [PRIVACY.md]: Privacy Policy.

## Key Concepts
- Berdikari (Independent): Local-first data sovereignty with on-device AI.
- Poetic Indonesian: Naming convention for core modules (Aksara, Brankas, Gudang, Pundi).
- Sentinel Security: Client-side encryption using AES-GCM 256-bit and Argon2id.
- Decoupled Storage: Web uses IndexedDB, CLI uses local JSON, unified by Adapter Pattern.
